action_item: Billing - Discuss the billing process in Dr. Cloud EHR and how to create and manage claims.
notes: Focus on generating claims, marking claims as billed, and handling special scenarios.

action_item: Rate Tables - Update the rate tables and master charge list in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Ensure usual and customary rates are current and editable based on date ranges.

action_item: Claim Rules - Configure claim rules for specific service codes and insurance companies.
notes: Set rules for missing information and notifications for claims not generated.

action_item: Prior Authorizations - Implement a system to manage prior authorizations and authorized units.
notes: Ensure the system checks authorized units before creating appointments.

action_item: Collections - Set up a process for placing clients in collections based on outstanding balances.
notes: Utilize the collections aging report to identify clients for collections.

action_item: Contract Management - Manage payer contracts and ensure contracted rates are accurately reflected.
notes: Update the system to reflect contracted rates for services provided.

action_item: General Ledger - Export billing transactions to the general ledger software.
notes: Ensure transactions are accurately exported for accounting purposes.
